statements: DELETE FROM pricing_strategy WHERE product_id = 100 AND base_price > 50;
DELETE FROM pricing_strategy WHERE product_id = 10 AND base_price > 50;
DELETE FROM pricing_strategies WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
DELETE FROM pricing_history WHERE pricing_strategy_id = 1 AND date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM demand_data WHERE strategy_id = 1 AND date = '2022-05-01'
DELETE FROM competition_data WHERE competitor_name = 'Apple' AND competitor_price = 999.99
DELETE FROM demand_data WHERE product_id = 10 AND demand_date = '2022-05-15';
DELETE FROM pricing_history WHERE price > 100 AND date_of_change < '2022-01-01';
